Series I. Human Resources and Personnel: General Office Files
Time Inc. Human Resources and Personnel Records
Time Inc. Human Resources and Personnel Records

The Applicant Flow Project includes impact reports, applicant data, interview record sheets and other reports regarding demographics for each department at Time Inc. It looks like statistics that Human Resources collected in the event they needed to report to the U.S. Equal Employment Opportunity Commission (EEOC).
